Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
Controller.

This ManagerController class manages all manager-related operations including project management, registration approvals, application processing, enquiry handling, and report generation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a ManagerController for the specified manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController(Manager manager)
      Constructs a ManagerController for the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager associated with this controller

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String name, String neighbourhood, boolean visibility, int num2Rooms, int num3Rooms, String openingDate, String closingDate, int availOfficerSlots, Manager manager, int price2room, int price3room)
      Creates a new project with the specified parameters. Validates that the new project's opening date doesn't conflict with existing projects.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project
      neighbourhood - the neighborhood where the project is located
      visibility - whether the project is visible to applicants
      num2Rooms - the number of 2-room units available
      num3Rooms - the number of 3-room units available
      openingDate - the opening date for applications (YYYY-MM-DD)
      closingDate - the closing date for applications (YYYY-MM-DD)
      availOfficerSlots - the number of officer slots available for the project
      manager - the manager in charge of the project
      price2room - the price for 2-room units
      price3room - the price for 3-room units
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date format is invalid

    • editProject

      public void editProject(Project proj, String name, String neighbourhood, boolean visibility, int num2Rooms, int num3Rooms, String openingDate, String closingDate, int availOfficerSlots, Manager manager1, int price2room, int price3room)
      Updates an existing project with new parameters.
      Parameters:
      proj - the project to be updated
      name - the new name of the project
      neighbourhood - the new neighborhood where the project is located
      visibility - the new visibility status
      num2Rooms - the new number of 2-room units
      num3Rooms - the new number of 3-room units
      openingDate - the new opening date (YYYY-MM-DD)
      closingDate - the new closing date (YYYY-MM-DD)
      availOfficerSlots - the new number of officer slots
      manager1 - the manager in charge of the project
      price2room - the new price for 2-room units
      price3room - the new price for 3-room units

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(Project projToDelete)
      Deletes a project from the system.
      Parameters:
      projToDelete - the project to be deleted

    • viewOwnProjects

      public void viewOwnProjects()
      Displays all projects managed by the current manager.

    • approveOrRejectOfficerRegistration

      public void approveOrRejectOfficerRegistration()
      Processes pending officer registrations for projects managed by this manager. Allows the manager to approve or reject registration requests.

    • approveOrRejectApplicantApplication

      public void approveOrRejectApplicantApplication()
      Processes pending applicant applications for projects managed by this manager. Allows the manager to approve or reject application requests.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public void viewAllEnquiries()
      Displays all enquiries in the system.

    • viewProjectEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> viewProjectEnquiries()
      Returns all enquiries for a specific project managed by this manager.
      Returns:
      a list of enquiries for the selected project, or null if no valid project is selected

    • replyToEnquiry

      public void replyToEnquiry()
      Allows the manager to reply to enquiries for their projects.

    • approveOrRejectWithdrawal

      public void approveOrRejectWithdrawal()
      Processes withdrawal requests for applications to projects managed by this manager. Allows the manager to approve or reject withdrawal requests.

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport()
      Generates reports for all applications in the system and displays them.

    • viewApplicantReports

      public void viewApplicantReports()
      Displays reports for applicants with various filtering options. Allows filtering by age group, marital status, project name, and flat type.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of projects managed by this manager. This method appears to be incomplete in the implementation.
